title: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: When updating the checked state of the table, no busy cursor is shown.
EB: A busy cursor should be shown while updating the checked state of the table.
SR:
1. Open the Export Zip feature.
2. Perform an action that updates the checked state of the table.
3. Observe that a busy cursor is not shown.
4. Verify that the checked state of the table is correctly updated.
